topic.title: What's the market to build a commerce site on ZeroNet?
topic.body:
Ok!  Let's say I buy in to all of the goodness for ZeroNet.  How many people are online?   What's the demographics like?  

I want to get a feel if I can invest to build some online businesses in the framework.  Not just marketplaces, but other business models.

Sorry if this has been addressed.  I'm a N00B!

1578202687_1JGiVKenWPWgSZpRgNufyk9TAEp67.body: Thank you all for the input!

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_1523_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): beaker browser

Big assumption.  And what do you do with your life?
